promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical hawk electric-type pokemon wearing a lightning-charged mask. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or hawk. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltigravis, a a gigantic mythical hawk electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Turbo Bolt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "hawk", "electric" or "Voltigravis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, hawk-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Urban Myth: Voltigravis. Charged feathers power neon cities. Turbo Bolt radiates pulsing currents. Nests atop skyscrapers, ruling the skyline.
